price: Wakasema: Mola wetu Mlezi anajua kwamba hakika sisi tumetumwa kwenu.
arabic: قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا يَعۡلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمُرۡسَلُونَ
footnotes: Wale Wajumbe wakasema: Mola wetu Mlezi aliye tutuma anajua kuwa hakika sisi bila ya shaka tumetumwa kwenu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālū rabbunā yaʿlamu innā ilaykum lamur'salūna
